comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66546790@N07] Thank you Antoine R, we have updated our records. Are you familiar with the Imperial Japanese Navy cruisers?
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 66546790@N07
comment._content: It is not difficult to tell the German-built Yakumo from the Armstrong pair Izumo and Iwate. Main difference is the form of funnels. The Yakumo had shorter and thicker ones. Another difference is the number and arrangement of deflectors. Also there are other details but those are much visible.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
